casebody.data:
No. 10-941. Derrick O’Neal Mason, Petitioner v. Kim T. Thomas, Interim Commissioner, Alabama Department of Corrections. 564 U.S. 1031, 131 S. Ct. 3050,

180 L. Ed. 2d 867,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4658. June 20, 2011.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 563 U.S. 960, 131 S. Ct. 2175, 179 L. Ed. 2d 935, 2011 U.S. LEXIS 3206.
